txt.en: 'We oft keep in touch with the Elves of the Rivendell. One called Barachen I consider a close friend. A letter I received from him not long ago indicated that trouble was afoot within the Trollshaws, and he was seeking my advice. I worry for him.\n\n'He has a small camp far to the east of here, in the Trollshaws, just beyond the Last Bridge from the Lone-lands. Would you go to him and learn what troubles him?'
'So, the Rangers of Evendim have sent you to help?'
'Have you spoken to Barachen yet? He has a camp in the Trollshaws.'
Barachen has a small camp east of Evendim, in the Trollshaws.
Talk to Barachen at his camp in the Trollshaws
Barachen's camp is far to the east of Evendim, in the Trollshaws, just beyond the Last Bridge from the Lone-lands.\n\nOrchalwÃ« has asked you to speak with his friend Barachen.
